name: Blossom Garden Crush Paradise
description:
Blossom Garden Crush Paradise

Get ready for Blossom Garden Crush Paradise time!! Start a fun-tastic puzzle solving quest, There're tons of surprises for you to discover. Come on into this amazingly tasty Blossom Garden Crush Paradise world, and begin enjoying 200 levels of delicious challenges NOW!!!

:::Features:::

• 200 sweet levels to explore! (LV new update you soon.)
• Easy to learn and enjoyable match 3 game for the young & young at heart!
• A new flavor of matching puzzle game, challenging and delicious.
• Unique power-ups specially designed in each levels.
• Innovative new gameplay: clear a way to collect the target candies.

====== How to Play ======
• Match flower blossom as many as you can to get higher score in group 3 or more.
• Collect a certain number of target candies to pass the level.
• flower blossom is free to play.
